name: My 6000 Horrors
description:
A short while ago I celebrated my 5000 YouTube subscribers by making a game devoted to several indie horrors people both love and hate, it proved to be a very popular and I am now working on my 6000 YouTube subscriber game and I plan to make one every 1000 until I hit the big 10k.

In this game we continue from where we left off into a more in-depth adventure of horror, adventure and things that just do not make sense.  The galaxy is flooding with unknown characters from a variety of well known horror games and other genre.  You are tasked to continue your adventure to find out what is going on and return them back to where they came from but it will not be easy.  So who can we expect to see?

SCP-173 and SCP-173-B (My own twist).
Spooky and her Specimens (and others you won't be expecting).
Slenderman.
Jeff the Killer.
Sparky.
And many more plus other creations you wont expect.

I am open to any suggestions on what you would like to see, anything is possible in these worlds of mine.  If you are new to these games check out the 5000 Nightmare game now or view my channel  :) Hope you enjoy.

YouTuber:  Fellowplayer
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCXzcduiD99hcDMhhCzByRiA

My 5000 Nightmares:  https://gamejolt.com/games/my5000nightmares/308900
